    I am a 24 year old developer, consultant, and entrepreneur. I am based in Nagpur, India, working on open source projects worldwide in Ruby on Rails and JavaScript. I’m an active contributor to the RailsApps project, helping build starter apps used by Rails developers worldwide. You can see some of my work on GitHub. Join me in Nagpur if you’d like to chat about the startup scene, good coffee, or software craftsmanship. Or get in touch with email or a video call to explore how I can help with your project.
